title: [WIP][c10d] Implemented c10d front-end APIs, and env:// init method
body_html:
Depending on #10199

First version of what c10d front-end python looks like, try to match what we have in torch.distributed. To do so, we create a default process group, if not specified, or use the users' provided process group. Most of the API would look the same.

Currently a WIP, I need to test and write test for it. Also would like merge all the dependent commit before reviewing.
body_text:
Depending on #10199
First version of what c10d front-end python looks like, try to match what we have in torch.distributed.  To do so, we create a default process group, if not specified, or use the users' provided process group. Most of the API would look the same.
Currently a WIP, I need to test and write test for it. Also would like merge all the dependent commit before reviewing.
body:
Depending on https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/10199

First version of what c10d front-end python looks like, try to match what we have in `torch.distributed`.  To do so, we create a default `process group`, if not specified, or use the users' provided process group. Most of the API would look the same.

Currently a WIP, I need to test and write test for it. Also would like merge all the dependent commit before reviewing.
